subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For Towns, the No. 1 overall pick by the Minnesota Timberwolves, his first season in the N.B.A. is about improving on a ceiling that is already sky-high.
snippet: For Towns, the No. 1 overall pick by the Minnesota Timberwolves, his first season in the N.B.A. is about improving on a ceiling that is already sky-high.
